Source.Name: diffstat
Source.Summary: diffstat reads the output of diff and displays a histogram of the insertions, deletions, and modifications per-file
Source.Description: diffstat reads the output of diff and displays a histogram of the insertions, deletions, and modifications per-file. It is useful for reviewing large, complex patch files.

Package.Name: diffstat
Package.Summary: diffstat reads the output of diff and displays a histogram of the insertions, deletions, and modifications per-file
Package.Description: diffstat reads the output of diff and displays a histogram of the insertions, deletions, and modifications per-file. It is useful for reviewing large, complex patch files.
